S.FORM: Billy Ray Bates Billy Ray Bates sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1956, ryax sa tay 31 nqu tay 5, Billy Ray Bates, squliq na p'unro. qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Billy Ray Bates htagan beh sa Frank ru Ellen Bates.te spat laqi na qutux ngasal. Billy Ray Bates hiya yaba ga ppqumah,Billy Ray Bates laqi nya.mrkay's maki Mississippi sharecroppers. Billy Ray Bates mzyu mari maki McAdams gocyu.suruw lga mzyu mari maki Kentucky hopa pqwasan biru. pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga
